```{r setup}
library(group26molbio)
```

## OVERVIEW 

The group26molbio package provides a collection of functions for performing basic operations in molecular biology — from DNA/RNA manipulation to sequence analysis. This vignette introduces each function and demonstrates how to use them effectively.

## INSTALLATION

```{r}
remotes::install_github("rforbiodatascience25/group_26_package")
```
